alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Scott County; Johnson County Higher Elevations; Newton County Higher Elevations; Northern Polk County Higher Elevations; Northern Scott County; Southern Johnson County; Southern and Eastern Logan County; Western and Northern Logan County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 8:40AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Logan, southwestern Newton, Johnson, western Scott and northwestern Polk Counties through 945 AM CDT... At 839 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Witter to 10 miles west of Octavia. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clarksville... Booneville... Waldron... Paris... Lamar... Mansfield... Magazine... Subiaco... Hartman... Scranton... Ratcliff... Beauchamp... Mountain Fork... Devils Knob... Hoyt... Rosetta... Woodland... Hinkle... Oliver... Echo... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
